I had a blast with a group of nine, it never felt crowded whatsoever since there were many areas we could split up and enjoy ourselves on our own or in smaller groups.

topComments.author: Chit Chat
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) WonderWorks √© uma atividade divertida para crian√ßas e jovens adultos. H√° brinquedos dentro do pr√©dio, como o Xtreme 360, o simulador de montanha-russa, carrinhos de choque girat√≥rios e muito mais. H√° tamb√©m uma grande caminhada pela corda / c√©u. Voc√™ fica preso a um equipamento de escalada (ap√≥s assinar um termo de responsabilidade) e come√ßa a experimentar toda a rede de obst√°culos de equil√≠brio. Aquela foi uma √≥tima pequena aventura! Na caminhada zip voc√™ encontrar√° pessoas de todas as idades, pois existem obst√°culos de diferentes intensidades. Algumas das m√°quinas para aprendizagem interativa dentro da instala√ß√£o estavam quebradas, o que foi um pouco decepcionante. A equipe foi √∫til e agrad√°vel e h√° uma pequena loja de presentes quando voc√™ sair da parte principal da instala√ß√£o. Acho que foi um pouco caro para o que recebemos, mas meu irm√£o se divertiu de que ele se lembrar√°.  (Original) WonderWorks is a fun activity for kids and young adults. There are rides withing the building such as the Xtreme 360, the Rollercoaster simulator, spinning bumper cars, and much more. There is also a large rope/sky walk. You get hooked into climbing gear (after signing a waiver) and get to experience the whole network of balance obstacles. That was a great little adventure! You will find people of all ages on the zip walk as there are obstacles of different intensity. Some of the machines for interactive learning within the facility were broken which was a bit disappointing. The staff was helpful and nice and there is a little gift shop when you exit the main part of the facility. I do think that it was a bit pricey for what we got, but my little brother had a fun that he will remember.
